Site 0 Tweetle 0 DÜZCE(İHA) – Düzce İl Emniyet Müdürlüğü ve İstanbul Özel Harekat Şube Müdürlüğü ekiplerinin yaptığı operasyonda göz altına alınan şahıslar hakkında mahkeme kararını verdi.Düzce Cumhuriyet Başsavcılığı koordinesinde Düzce İl Emniyet Müdürlüğü Narkotik Suçlarla Mücadele Şube Müdürlüğü ekiplerinin Ağa Mahallesi’nde İstanbul Özel Harekat Şube Müdürlüğü ekiplerinin desteği ile yaptığı operasyonda narkotik suçlardan göz altına alınan şahıslar hakkında mahkeme kararını verdi. Özellikle torbacılık, uyuşturucu temini gibi suçlardan göz altına alınan 10 kişiden 6’sı tutuklanırken, 1 şahıs adli kontrol ile serbest bırakıldı. 3 şahıs ise serbest kaldı.Yapılan operasyonda 2 adet ruhsatsız 9 milimetre çapınca tabanca, 1 adet ruhsatsız 7,65 milimetre çapında tabanca, 9 milimetre çapınca 29 adet tabanca fişeği, 5 adet ruhsatsız av tüfeği ve bu tüfeğe ait çok sayıda fişek, 1 adet kurusıkı tabanca, yüklü miktarda bonzai maddesi ile esrar maddesi, suçlardan elde edilen paralar yakalanmıştı.Kaynak: İHA

posts.author: sxconthach
posts.title: Chuyển Giao Công Nghệ Sản Xuất Cồn Thạch
posts.text:
Chuyển Giao Công Nghệ Sản Xuất Cồn Thạch
 Sản xuất, kinh doanh cồn thạch và cồn khô cho người mới bắt đầu khởi nghiệp mà không cần nhiều vốn. Tôi sẽ hướng dẫn cho các bạn làm thực tế quy trình sản xuất cồn thạch, cồn khô và cồn gel.
Liên hệ SĐT: 0122.9625.524 (Mr. Thành)
1. Cồn thạch
Hiện nay cồn thạch được sử dụng phổ biến hơn so với cồn khô do có nhiều ưu điểm. Công thức sản xuất cồn thạch không dùng nhiệt nên rất an toàn và thiết bị đơn giản. Công thức làm cồn thạch cho nhiệt lượng lớn, cháy lâu (30-35 phút cho 125g). Đặc biệt cồn thạch khi đốt không để lại cặn bã, dễ dàng vệ sinh bếp cồn. Không có khí độc hại và cay mắt nên rất an toàn cho người sử dụng.
Chi phí cho thiết bị sản xuất cồn thạch khoảng 10-20 triệu, diện tích 16m2 là có thể làm được với quy mô vừa và nhỏ. Nếu bạn có khả năng phân phối cồn thạch với số lượng lớn thì có thể đầu tư thiết bị tự động 100-200 triệu để sản xuất ở quy mô lớn. Lợi nhuận trung bình 25%.
2. Cồn Khô
Viên cồn khô làm ra đốt lên không khói và không cay mắt. Chất lượng viên cồn cứng, dễ vận chuyển, không chảy nước. Giá cả cạnh tranh.
Tôi sẽ chỉ dẫn cho các bạn 3 loại cồn khô (bao gồm cả cồn khô siêu cháy không chảy nước khi đốt). Các bạn có thể điều chỉnh được chất lượng cồn khô trong quá trình sản xuất. Thiết bị sản xuất đơn giản, có thể đặt làm tại các tiệm Inox. Chỉ cần diện tích nhỏ 16 m2, các bạn có khả năng sản xuất 500 kg cồn khô/ngày.
3. Cồn gel (cồn dẻo)
Cồn gel sản xuất ra khi đốt không khói, có mùi hương dễ chịu, không cay mắt. Quy trình sản xuất cồn gel đơn giản hơn cồn khô vì không dùng nhiệt. Không cần nhiều thiết bị và khuôn mẫu, ít nhân công. Chi phí thấp. Có thể sản xuất hơn 1 tấn cồn gel/ngày.
Tôi sẽ hướng dẫn trực tiếp cho các bạn tự tay làm ra sản phẩm với thiết bị và hóa chất do tôi chuẩn bị sẵn.
Giá chuyển giao cho mỗi sản phẩm: 5 triệu. Có hợp đồng chuyển giao.
Liên hệ SĐT: 0122.9625.524 (Mr. Thành)
Ngoài ra tôi còn hướng dẫn sản xuất:
Nước lau kính
Nước lau sàn nhà
Nước tẩy rửa nhà tắm, nhà vệ sinh và bồn cầu…
Dầu gội đầu, dầu xả
Sữa tắm và các loại mỹ phẩm khác...
Các loại sơn nước và sơn dung môi
Các bạn cần sản xuất thêm sản phẩm gì có thể liên hệ trực tiếp với tôi.

posts.author: Duyên_Bé (invalid@example.com)
posts.title: Muối Tắm Tẩy Tế Bào Chết Sữa Bò A Bonné Spa Milk Salt
posts.text: Gian hàng Muối Tắm Tẩy Tế Bào Chết Sữa Bò A Bonné Spa Milk Salt Muối tắm tẩy tế bào chết A Bonné Spa Milk Salt được bổ sung nguồn dưỡng chất dồi dào từ sữa bò, yogurt, vitamin C nên cực kì lành tính và an toàn với mọi làn da. Không những thế, em ấy còn giúp hỗ trợ ngăn ngừa và phòng chống các bệnh về da như viêm nang lông, viêm da, mụn trứng cá. Đồng thời hỗ trợ làm giảm dần các vết thâm ở những vùng khó điều trị như đầu gối, nách, khuỷu tay… mang lại làn da trắng sáng tự nhiên hơn. Bên cạnh đó nguồn Vitamin E, Glycerin có trong sản phẩm còn giúp tái tạo da mới, cân bằng độ ẩm cho da mềm mại, mịn màng. Thành phần Protein có trong sữa còn giúp nuôi dưỡng cho làn da mềm mịn, khỏe mạnh và trắng hồng rạng rỡ. Những hạt muối siêu mịn không chỉ tạo cảm giác thư giãn tốt, hỗ trợ kích thích sự tuần hoàn máu cho làn da mà còn giúp loại bỏ sạch những tế bào chết. Hướng dẫn sử dụng: – Lấy 1 lượng tẩy tế bào chết vừa đủ ra tay, thoa đều cơ thể (trừ mặt ra), sau đó massage nhẹ nhàng khoảng 2 phút và tắm sạch với nước . – Sử dụng từ 1 – 2 lần mỗi tuần. ***HOẶC CÁC BẠN MUỐN MUA HÀNG CÓ THỂ LIÊN LẠC VỚI DUYÊN QUA: -FACEBOOK: 0903073750 (Duyên Bé) -PAGE FACEBOOK: Nguyên Liệu Kem Trộn Trắng Da -SHOPEE: NGUYÊN LIỆU KEM TRỘN (duyenbe2206) -HOTLINE: 0903073750--0902420648 SHOP CHUYÊN CUNG CẤP KEM BODY TRẮNG DA ĐỘC QUYỀN-TRẮNG VĨNH VIỄN-KEM TẮM TRẮNG-NGUYÊN LIỆU KEM TRỘN https://www.facebook.com/ fyrtyyu

posts.title: “スーパーサブ”でも4得点、マンU・FWマルシャル「もっと良いパフォーマンスが続けば…」（ゲキサカ）
posts.text: “スーパーサブ”でも4得点、マンU・FWマルシャル「もっと良いパフォーマンスが続けば…」 11/7(火) 18:13配信 スーパーサブ的な起用ながら今季4得点を挙げているマンチェスター・ユナイテッドのFWアントニー・マルシャルだが、スタメンの座を射止めるためには、まだまだパフォーマンスを上げなければならないと考えているようだ。イギリスメディア『ミラー』が伝えている。 マルシャルは今季、プレミアリーグ11試合のうち10試合に出場しているが、先発は3試合のみ。それでもここまでレギュラーを張っているFWマーカス・ラッシュフォードより1つ多い4ゴールを挙げ、10月にはクラブの月間MVPにも選ばれている。 『SFRスポーツ』のインタビューに答えたマルシャルは「ベンチからの出場だと、すでに身体が暖まっていて試合に入っている選手たちに、途中からついていかなければならなくなる。スタメンで出れたほうがうれしい」とキックオフからピッチに立ちたい気持ちを口にした。 一方で、「もっと良いパフォーマンスが続けば、もっとプレー時間は多くなると思う」とジョゼ・モウリーニョ監督への信頼をアピール。「ベンチから出場したときでさえ、僕なら違いを生み出せる。もっとスタメンで試合に出たいし、自分ができることを示したい。フォワードにとってゴールできることはうれしいことだよ」と、引き続き得点を奪っていけるよう意気込んでいる。 【関連記事】

thread.title: Her sekiz kadından biri MEME KANSERİ tehdidi altında
thread.title_full: Her sekiz kadından biri MEME KANSERİ tehdidi altında

posts.title: Her sekiz kadından biri MEME KANSERİ tehdidi altında
posts.text:
- Her sekiz kadından biri MEME KANSERİ tehdidi altında HER SEKİZ KADINDAN BİRİ MEME KANSERİ TEHDİDİ ALTINDA 07 Kasım 2017 Salı 11:53 0 426 Dünyada ve Türkiye'de kadınlarda en sık görülen kanser olan meme kanseri, kadınlarda ölümle sonuçlanan kanser türleri arasında birinci sırada 
Meme Kanseri Farkındalık Ayı vesilesiyle görüş bildiren İç Hastalıkları ve Medikal Onkoloji Uzmanı Prof. Dr. Nilüfer Güler, yenilikçi ilaçlar ve tedavi seçenekleri sayesinde metastatik meme kanserinde beş yıllık sağ kalım süresinin %10'lardan %22'lere yükseldiğini vurguladı. 
İç Hastalıkları ve Medikal Onkoloji Uzmanı Prof. Dr. Nilüfer Güler, tanı anında metastatik meme kanserinin gelişmiş ülkelerde %6 gibi düşük bir oranda görülürken, az gelişmiş olan bölgelerde bu oranın %50-80'lere çıkabildiğini belirtti ve şöyle devam etti: “Ülkemizde meme kanseri görülme oranı %10'dur. Başlangıçta erken evre meme kanseri olan hastaların takibinde de, hastalığın başlangıç evresi ve tümör özelliklerine göre değişkenlik göstererek, %20 ile %50 oranında metastatik hastalık gelişebilmektedir.” 
Metastatik meme kanserinde yakınmalar metastaz bölgesine göre değişiyor Yaşamı boyunca, her 8 kadından birinin meme kanserine yakalanmasının beklendiğini belirten Prof. Dr. Nilüfer Güler şunları söyledi: “Meme kanseri erken tanı imkanı olan bir kanserdir. Bu nedenle tüm kadınların erken tanı ve tarama programlarına katılmaları, kendi memelerini tanımaları, bu konudaki farkındalığın artması çok önemli. 
Meme kanseri, hastalığın yaygınlığına göre 0'dan 4'e kadar dört farklı evrede değerlendirilir. Evre 0, in situ kanser dediğimiz evredir. 
Bu evrede metastaz riski %1'den azdır. Evre 1 ve 2 erken evre meme kanseri, evre 3 lokal ileri meme kanseri, evre 4 ise metastatik meme kanseri olarak adlandırılır. 

Metastatik evrede kanser hücreleri, meme dışında başka organlara yayılır. Memedeki kanserli hücreler lenf damarları ve kan damarları yoluyla başta kemik, akciğer, karaciğer, daha az olasılıkla beyin olmak üzere başka organlara metastaz yapabilirler. 
Daha nadir görülen metastaz bölgeleri akciğer zarı, karın zarı, kalp zarı, beyin zarları; çok daha nadir olarak sindirim sistemi, yumurtalıklar, idrar torbası olabilmektedir. 
Hastaların hastalığın yerine göre yakınmaları vardır: Kemik metastazlarında kemik ağrıları; beyin metastazlarında baş ağrısı, baş dönmesi, akciğer metastazlarında nefes darlığı, öksürük; karaciğer metastazlarında karın ağrısı gibi. 
Düzenli takipte olan hastaların hiçbir yakınması olmayabilir, yapılan muayene ve tetkikler sonucunda ortaya çıkabilir.” 
Tedavide yakınmaları azaltmak, yaşam süresini uzatmak ve yaşam kalitesini yüksek tutmak hedeflenmeli Prof. Dr. Nilüfer Güler metastatik meme kanserindeki tedavi seçeneklerini şöyle özetledi: “Seçenekler arasında cerrahi (özellikle tek organ, sınırlı metastazlar), radyoterapi (beyin, kemik gibi organlara metastaz) ve sistemik tedaviler vardır. 

Sistemik tedaviler içinde hormonal tedaviler, kemoterapi ve biyolojik tedaviler yer alır. Radyofrekans ablasyon, radyoembolizasyon, kemoembolizasyon gibi lokal tedavi uygulamaları da tümörün yerine göre önerdiğimiz tedavi seçenekleri arasındadır. 
Metastatik meme kanserinde uygulanan tedaviler, hastalığın verdiği cevaba göre hastalık bulgularında azalma ve artmalarla seyreder. 
Tedavi seçimi hastanın yaşı, menopoz durumu, genel durumu, ek sağlık sorunları, istekleri, sosyo-ekonomik durumu ve en önemlisi tümör özellikleri ve metastazın olduğu bölgeler ve tümör yüküne göre belirlenir. 

Tedavinin amacı hastalığa bağlı yakınmaları azaltmak, yaşam süresini uzatabilmek ve bunları amaçlarken de yaşam kalitesini maksimumda tutabilmektir. Pek çok hastamız tedaviyle birlikte normal günlük aktivitelerine, çalışmalarına devam edebilmektedir. 
Uygulanan tedavilere cevap alınıp alınmadığı belli aralıklarla yapılan öykü, fizik inceleme, laboratuvar testleri ve gerekli görülen radyolojik tetkiklerle anlaşılır.” 
Hormon reseptörleri ve HER2 testinin sonucu sistemik tedavi seçimini belirliyor 
Prof. Dr. Nilüfer Güler, sistemik tedavi seçimindeki en önemli faktörlerin tümör özellikleri (östrojen ve progesteron hormon reseptörleri) ve HER2 testi sonucu olduğunu belirterek şöyle devam etti: “Bu testler, memedeki primer tümör dokusunda ve/veya biyopsi yapılabiliyorsa metastaz bölgesinden alınan dokuda mutlaka çalışılmalıdır. Hormon reseptörleri pozitif bir 4'üncü evre meme kanseri vakasında, tümör yükü de az ise öncelikle tercih edilen tedaviler hormonal (antiöstrojen) tedavilerdir. 

HER2 pozitif hastalıkta anti-HER2 ilaçlar, kemoterapi veya hormonal tedaviyle birlikte uygulanırlar. 
Bu ilaçların klinik kullanıma girmesi bu gruptaki hastalarda bir devrim yaratmıştır. Çok iyi yanıtlar alabilmemizi sağlamış ve hastaların yaşam sürelerinde çok anlamlı uzamalar elde edilmiştir. Yeni anti-HER2 ajanların da klinik çalışmaları devam etmektedir.” “Üçlü negatif dediğimiz hormon reseptörleri ve HER2 testi negatif olan hastalarda tek silahımız kemoterapidir. 

Bu grupta BRCA1-2 testleri dediğimiz gen testlerinden birinde mutasyon olması durumunda tedavide PARP inhibitörleri dediğimiz ilaçların kullanılması daha iyi ve uzun süreli yanıt alınmasını sağlayabilmektedir. 
Hormon reseptörleri pozitif, HER2 testi negatif olan metastatik hastalıkta son dönemde hormonal tedaviye direnç gelişimini engelleyen yeni moleküller geliştirilmiştir. 
Bunlardan biri m-TOR inhibitörü olan ilaç, diğerleri CDK4/6 inhibitörleri denilen ilaçlardır. Bu ilaçların aromataz inhibitörleri dediğimiz ilaçlarla birlikte verilmesi metastatik hastalığın kontrolde kalma ve hastalarımızın kemoterapiye geçme sürelerinde çok anlamlı uzama sağlamışlardır. 

Bu grupta yer alan bazı ilaçlar tek ajan olarak da etkili olabilmektedir. Kemik metastazları olan hastalarda bisfosfonat dediğimiz ilaçların kullanılması kemik ağrılarının azalmasına, kırılma riskinin azalmasına yardımcı olmaktadırlar. 

Bu ilaçlar kullanılmadan önce dişlerde tedavi gerektiren bir durum varsa mutlaka çözülmesi gereklidir. İlaçlara başlandıktan sonra diş tedavisi yapıldığı taktirde çene kemiğinde iyileşmeyen yaralar olmaktadır. 
Hem kanser tedavisi hem de destek tedavisinde kullanılacak ilaçlarla ilgili pek çok çalışma devam etmektedir.”

thread.title: Украина начнет производство боеприпасов крупного калибра
thread.title_full: Украина начнет производство боеприпасов крупного калибра

posts.title: Украина начнет производство боеприпасов крупного калибра
posts.text:
Фото: rnbo.gov.ua Новости Бизнеса: Александр Турчинов анонсировал начало серийного производства боеприпасов крупного калибра. . 
Секретарь Совета национальной безопасности и обороны Украины Александр Турчинов анонсировал начало серийного производства боеприпасов крупного калибра. 
Как сообщили в пресс-службе СНБО, об этом Турчинов заявил после завершения испытаний на военном полигоне в Девичках (Киевская область). 
По его словам, СНБО поставил задачу перед украинским оборонным комплексом наладить производство боеприпасов. "Это очень важная тема для укрепления обороноспособности страны, ее актуальность значительно возросла после того, как были уничтожены два наших мощных арсенала", - сказал он. 
Он сообщил об успешных военных испытаниях боеприпасов, произведенных на украинских предприятиях. "И что очень важно - это самая дефицитная группа боеприпасов, а именно: 152-миллиметровые снаряды, гранаты (ВОГ) для АГС и 60-миллиметровые мины для новых украинских минометов, которые уже поставлены на вооружение Вооруженных сил Украины", - сказал Турчинов. 
Турчинов добавил, что во время стрельб все боеприпасы подтвердили заданные боевые характеристики. 
Также он отметил, что после проведения в ближайшее время государственных испытаний и принятия на вооружение этих боеприпасов начнется их серийное производство. 
Секретарь СНБО подчеркнул, что после начала серийного производства "у наших военных на фронте уже не будет проблем ни с гранатами для АГС, ни с боеприпасами крупного калибра, ни с минами для минометов". 
Как сообщалось, вечером 26 сентября на открытой площадке хранения боеприпасов войсковой части А1119 вблизи города Калиновка Винницкой области произошли пожар и взрывы. Пострадали два человека. Информация о пожаре и взрывах на военном складе в Калиновке внесена в Единый реестр досудебных расследований по ст.113 Уголовного кодекса (диверсия). 
23 марта на арсенале в Балаклее Харьковской области произошла диверсия, в результате которой детонировали снаряды на военном арсенале. Взрывами были повреждены десятки зданий. Одна жительница Балаклеи во время взрывов погиб в результате падения конструкций дома.

posts.author: Redazione Online
posts.title: Trump in Corea del Sud: speranza per una soluzione delle tensioni
posts.text: Il presidente americano Trump è giunto n Corea del Sud, seconda tappa del giro in estremo Oriente, dove è stato accolto dal presidente Moon Jae-In. Al centro degli colloqui, ovviamente le minacce nucleari e missilistiche che arrivano dalla Corea del Nord. Ed ha subito espresso la speranza che le tensioni nella penisola coreana si possano risolvere, perchè 'tutto si risolve', ha detto riferendosi alle tensioni con Pyongyang. La Corea del Sud per garantire la sicurezza di Trump ha dispiegato oltre 15 mila agenti. A partire dal monitoraggio delle manifestazioni di protesta. Stamani decine di persone si sono radunate nei pressi dell'ufficio presidenziale esponendo cartelli non propriamente di benvenuto per Trump, assieme allo slogan "no war".

thread.title: Knockaert credits manager Hughton for Brighton's success
thread.title_full: Knockaert credits manager Hughton for Brighton's success

posts.title: Knockaert credits manager Hughton for Brighton's success
posts.text:
Knockaert credits manager Hughton for Brighton's success (Reuters) In their first top-flight campaign since 1983, Brighton have exceeded expectations by earning four wins and three draws from their opening 11 games, climbing to eighth in the table. Source: Tweet 
Knockaert said Hughton's influence was there for all to see in wins at West Ham United and Swansea City over the last few weeks. 
"West Ham and Swansea away, it's never easy to win at these places, but we're lucky enough to have a great manager and he knows what to do to win football games," Knockaert told the club's website. 
"We put everything he says into the games. It's working for us at the moment, and it's really important for our confidence that we haven't lost in four games. 
"The last two games away from home, we've had two great performances and showed a lot of character." 
Brighton's next league game is a home tie against Stoke City on Nov. 20. 
(Reporting by Aditi Prakash in Bengaluru) Advertisement Advertisement Trending News

thread.title: Toyota legt im Halbjahr zu
thread.title_full: Toyota legt im Halbjahr zu

posts.title: Toyota legt im Halbjahr zu
posts.text:
07. November 2017 Toyota legt im Halbjahr zu Tokio (dpa) - Japans größter Autobauer Toyota hat den Nettogewinn in der ersten Hälfte des laufenden Geschäftsjahres erhöht. Wie der Volkswagen-Rivale nach Börsenschluss bekanntgab, fiel zwischen April und September unter dem Strich ein Ertrag von 1,07 Billionen Yen an (rund 8 Mrd Euro). Toyota-Produktion im japanischen Toyota. Der Konzern hat die Prognose für das noch bis Ende März 2018 laufende Gesamtgeschäftsjahr angehoben. Foto: Everett Kennedy Brown dpanitf3 
Das ist ein Zuwachs von 13,2 Prozent im Vergleich zum Vorjahreszeitraum. Der Umsatz stieg um 8,6 Prozent auf 14,19 Billionen Yen. Das Unternehmen, zu dem auch die Nutzfahrzeugtochter Hino Motors und der Kleinwagenbauer Daihatsu gehören, hob die Prognose für das noch bis Ende März 2018 laufende Gesamtgeschäftsjahr dank des schwachen Yen an und rechnet nun mit 1,95 Billionen Yen Gewinn statt wie bisher mit 1,75 Billionen.

thread.title: Servicios de Txingudi fomenta el consumo de agua del grifo entre los escolares
thread.title_full: Servicios de Txingudi fomenta el consumo de agua del grifo entre los escolares

posts.author: forociudadanoirunes (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Servicios de Txingudi fomenta el consumo de agua del grifo entre los escolares
posts.text: Este blog se crea para que todos los ciudadanos puedan expresar libremente sus opiniones, y además poder aportar todas estas ideas y compartirlas con el resto de la ciudadanía. martes, 7 de noviembre de 2017 Servicios de Txingudi fomenta el consumo de agua del grifo entre los escolares Noticia publicada en Diario Vasco,el martes día 7 de Noviembre de 2017. Servicios de Txingudi fomenta el consumo de agua del grifo entre los escolares ¡A hidratarse!. Teresa Errandonea, Leire Zubitur y Pedro Alegre, con un grupo de escolares. / F. DE LA HERA Los integrantes de los equipos de Eskola Kirola recibirán botellines reutilizables, dentro de la campaña 'Txingudiko Ura' IÑIGO MORONDO IRUN. Martes, 7 noviembre 2017, 00:20 Servicios de Txingudi mantiene un año más su apuesta por utilizar el deporte como plataforma para concienciar a los ciudadanos en el consumo del agua del grifo. Además de colaborar en los puestos de avituallamiento de las carreras populares que tienen lugar en la comarca, Servicios de Txingudi viene desarrollando estos últimos años una campaña específica destinada a los jóvenes participantes del programa de deporte escolar de Irun y Hondarribia denominada 'Txingudiko ura'. Durante las próximas semanas, la empresa pública hará llegar botellines de agua reutilizables a todos los niños y niñas bidasotarras de entre 8 y 12 años que, a través de su centro escolar, están inscritos en el programa Eskola Kirola. El reparto comenzó de manera simbólica el pasado sábado por la mañana en el polideportivo Azken Portu, aprovechando la disputa de una jornada de competición escolar. «Os animo», invitó a los jóvenes deportistas la gerente de Servicios de Txingudi, Leire Zubitur, «a que utilicéis este botellín para hidrataros tanto en los entrenamientos como en vuestros partidos». Insistió en que no se trata sólo de «impulsar que se beba agua del grifo porque en esta comarca es de buena calidad», sino de evitar generar residuos al consumir agua embotellada «porque esos botellines no se reutilizan y acaban en la basura». «Impulsamos el consumo de agua del grifo, porque es de buena calidad»«Con estos botellines reutilizables vamos a evitar generar más residuos» Zubitur estuvo acompañada por el delegado de Deportes, Pedro Alegre, y la atleta del BAT Teresa Errandonea, campeona de España promesa y subcampeona absoluta en 100 metros vallas y recientemente galardonada como mejor deportista irundarra del año. «Llevo muchísimos años haciendo deporte y una de las cosas que he aprendido es la importancia de hidratarse, tanto para el que hace deporte como para el que no». La atleta irundarra propuso que los botellines que escolares van a recibir «no los utilicéis sólo cuando estéis con el equipo y os los llevéis también cuando quedéis con los amigos para echar un partido, incluso los podéis llevar al colegio». Errandonea remarcó «la suerte que tenemos de vivir donde vivimos y tener agua de calidad que está disponible y accesible siempre, donde queramos». Cerró su intervención con una última recomendación: «pasadlo bien haciendo deporte». Antes de entregar los primeros botellines de esta nueva temporada, también Pedro Alegre quiso dirigirse a los jóvenes deportistas. En su caso, además de alentar el uso de los botellines que van a recibir para consumir agua del grifo, quiso indicarles que estas competiciones escolares en las que participan le parecen «muy importantes. Si hacéis deporte desde txikis será más fácil que sigáis haciéndolo cuando seáis mayores. Ahora podéis probar todos los deportes y así elegir lo que más os gusta para el futuro. Igual que vosotros, en Eskola Kirola, empezó también Teresa Errandonea, que hoy es toda una campeona». Publicado por ACTIVIDADES

質問ではドーキンスの言う誤解は関係ないにも関わらず、です
進化論信者はよく専門家以外は対して知識がないなどと言いますが、ドーキンスはあまりにも有名な進化論の擁護者であり、ダーウィニストです

あれだけ著書で胡散臭い進化の実験なども挙げていたのに、肝心な時に何も言えなくなるようですw進化論信者の皆さんはこれにどのような言い訳をするのでしょうか?

posts.title: Była tak wygłodzona, że nie mogła czekać. Właściciel nie miał sobie nic do zarzucenia
posts.text:
wczoraj (10:13) Była tak wygłodzona, że nie mogła czekać. Właściciel nie miał sobie nic do zarzucenia Wolontariusze z Ekostraży uratowali wygłodzoną suczkę, która żyła na jednej z posesji w okolicy Prusic w województwie dolnośląskim. Zwierzę wyglądało jak sama skóra i kości. Właściciel nie miał sobie nic do zarzucenia. Zapytany o to, czy to jego zwierzę odparł, że nie i że samo weszło przez otwartą bramę. Głosuj Opinie Zagłodzona Sunia z okolic Prusic. (facebook, Fot: EKOSTRAZ) 
- Kiedy tam przyjechaliśmy, zobaczyliśmy na podwórku bardzo wychudzoną suczkę. Była bardzo osłabiona, ale nie bała się kontaktu. Przy tej posesji było kilka mieszkań. Suczka zaprowadziła nas pod jedne z drzwi - powiedziała Anna Chrobot z ekostraży w rozmowie z TVN24. google maps Podziel się 
- Zabrać dziś mogliśmy więcej psów - w tym husky na kolczatce na metrowym łańcuchu. Ale domów tymczasowych brak - musimy wybierać. A ona nie może poczekać. To kochana starsza sunia w typie owczarka belgijskiego. Sama łagodność do psów kotów i ludzi - czytamy we wpisie, który aktywiści zamieścili na Facebooku. 
Suczka trafiła do weterynarza, który stwierdził, że nie jest chora, lecz po prostu niedożywiona. Czeka ją powolny powrót do zdrowia. Sąsiedzi właściciela nie chcą rozmawiać o wygłodzonym psie. Nie można przez to pociągnąć właściciela do odpowiedzialności. 
Zwierzę zamieszkało w bloku w mieszkaniu tymczasowym. Wolontariusze szukają dla niego nowego domu, a zainteresowane osoby proszą o kontakt lub wsparcie pieniężne, którego można udzielić tutaj . Polub WP Wiadomości

posts.title: Teray Gham ko
posts.text:
تیرے غم کو جاں کی تلاش تھی تیرے جاں نثار چلے گئے تیری راہ میں کرتے تھے سرطلب، سرِ رہگزار چلے گئے 
تیری کج ادائی سے ہار کے شبِ انتظار چلی گئی میرے ضبطِ حال سے روٹھ کر میرے غم گسار چلے گئے 
نہ سوالِ وصل، نہ عرضِ غم،نہ حکایتیں، نہ شکایتیں تیرے عہد میں* دلِ زار کے سبھی اختیار چلے گئے 
یہ ہمیں*تھے جن کے لباس پر سرِ راہ سیاہی لکھی گئی یہی داغ تھے جو سجا کے ہم سرِ بزم یار چلے گئے 
نہ رہا جنونِ رخِ وفا، یہ رسن یہ دار کرو گے کیا جنہیں*جرمِ عشق پہ ناز تھا وہ گناہ گار چلے گئے

thread.title_full: (USA-CT-New Haven) Account Assistant 3

posts.title: (USA-CT-New Haven) Account Assistant 3
posts.text:
Home View All Jobs ( 42,265 ) Yale University Account Assistant 3 in New Haven , Connecticut 
Position Focus: Initiates and performs patient registration through established patient registration process and network communications flow. Performs the required functions to establish and maintain the patients financial status classification and update the informational databases with payer and account information necessary to ensure accurate and timely billing for medical services. Customer service position working with patients, providers, insurance carriers and others on a daily basis. Monday - Thursday: 10:00am-6:00pm / Friday: 9:00am-5:00pm 
Essential Duties 1. Receives, classifies, and codes information. Reviews account records to ensure accuracy and completeness. Prepares and distributes billing statements. 2. Obtains and provides information related to accounts, procedures, and regulations. Establishes, maintains, and reconciles account records. 3. Reviews, logs, codes, and posts payments. Identifies and corrects errors. Totals and reconciles cash transactions daily. Monitors account records. Composes correspondence related to problem accounts. 4. Refers delinquent accounts to supervisor and collection agencies. Researches individual accounts. May summarize findings in brief reports. 5. Completes and processes forms. May present account information at legal proceedings. 6. Performs clerical functions incidental to account activity. 
Required Education and Experience Four years of related work experience, two of them in the same job family at the next lower level, and a high school level education; or two years of related work experience and an Associate's degree; or an equivalent combination of experience and education. 
Required Skill/Ability 1: Demonstrated ability using computerized database systems and Microsoft Office Suite, especially Word and Excel. Ability to learn and adapt to new software applications. 
Required Skill/Ability 2: Working knowledge of the medical insurance processing/verification process. 
Required Skill/Ability 3: Proficiency in providing superior customer service, including the ability to handle heavy telephone communication with patients, providers, insurance carriers, etc. in a professional, courteous and tactful manner. Ability to handle challenging/complicated situations professionally. 
Required Skill/Ability 4: Strong written and verbal communication skills. Team-oriented, flexible and ability to work with changing priorities and work flows. Ability to multi-task, problem-solve and prioritize. Good attention to detail. 
Required Skill/Ability 5: Demonstrated record of excellent attendance, punctuality and time management. Professional demeanor and attire. 
Preferred Education, Experience and Skills: Ability to speak Spanish preferred. Working knowledge of EPIC system. 
Drug Screen No 
Health Screening No 
Background Check Requirements All candidates for employment will be subject to pre-employment background screening for this position, which may include motor vehicle, DOT certification, drug testing and credit checks based on the position description and job requirements. All offers are contingent upon the successful completion of the background check. Please visit www.yale.edu/hronline/careers/screening/faqs.html for additional information on the background check requirements and process. 
Posting Disclaimer The intent of this job description is to provide a representative summary of the essential functions that will be required of the position and should not be construed as a declaration of specific duties and responsibilities of the particular position. Employees will be assigned specific job-related duties through their hiring departments. 
Affirmative Action Statement: Yale University considers applicants for employment without regard to, and does not discriminate on the basis of, an individual’s sex, race, color, religion, age, disability, status as a veteran, or national or ethnic origin; nor does Yale discriminate on the basis of sexual orientation or gender identity or expression. Title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972 protects people from sex discrimination in educational programs and activities at institutions that receive federal financial assistance. Questions regarding Title IX may be referred to the University’s Title IX Coordinator, at TitleIX@yale.edu, or to the U.S. Department of Education, Office for Civil Rights, 8th Floor, Five Post Office Square, Boston MA 02109-3921. Telephone: 617.289.0111, Fax: 617.289.0150, TDD: 800.877.8339, or Email: ocr.boston@ed.gov. 
Note Yale University is a tobacco-free campus 
Original Posting Date: 23-Oct-2017 
Supervisory Organization: Clinical Affairs - YMG Patient Registration

Time Type: Full time 
Compensation Grade: Labor Grade C

Work Week: Flexible or Non-Standard (for anything other than Standard)

thread.title: Ihr liebt Fisch? So esst ihr nachhaltig und mit gutem Gewissen
thread.title_full: Ihr liebt Fisch? So esst ihr nachhaltig und mit gutem Gewissen

posts.title: Ihr liebt Fisch? So esst ihr nachhaltig und mit gutem Gewissen
posts.text:
Ihr liebt Fisch? So esst ihr nachhaltig und mit gutem Gewissen Sponsored   
Jetzt mal Butter bei die Fische: Ich esse gerne Fisch. Eine gegrillte Makrele mit Zwiebeln und Kartoffelsalat gehört am Samstag zu meinem wöchentlichen Marktbesuch einfach dazu. Wenn bei meinem Lieblingsitaliener Dorade im Salzmantel auf der Karte steht, fällt mir die Wahl nicht schwer und auch Sushi esse ich gern und häufig. 
Früher als Kind habe ich gerne Fischstäbchen mit Kartoffelpüree und Spinat gegessen. Woher der Fisch zwischen der Panade kam, war mir damals ziemlich egal. Heute sieht das ganz anders aus. Ich ernähre mich bewusst und achte darauf, Produkte aus ökologischem Anbau und nachhaltiger Haltung zu kaufen, das gilt sowohl für Fleisch, als auch für Kaffee, Gemüse und eben Fisch. Ich möchte wissen, woher er kommt, wie er gefangen wurde und ob der Fischfang nachhaltig ist. Im Supermarkt hilft mir das blaue MSC-Siegel dabei – das ist übrigens auch auf der Packung von den Fischstäbchen drauf. © Florian Grill 
Mich fasziniert das Meer. Mir ist bewusst, wie wichtig ein gesundes und balanciertes Ökosystem für uns und die Erde ist. Leider ist der Zustand unserer Meere nicht ideal, Überfischung ist ein großes Problem, das uns am Ende alle betrifft. Seit 20 Jahren setzt sich der Marine Stewardship Council, kurz MSC, für nachhaltigen Fischfang ein. Mit dem gleichnamigen Siegel werden Fischereien aus- bzw. gekennzeichnet, die nachhaltig fischen, für einen gesunden Fischbestand sorgen und das Meer als Ökosystem und Lebensraum der Fische nicht beschädigen bzw. ihm nicht nachhaltig schaden. 
Als Seafood-Fan und Foodbloggerin landet öfters mal ein Fisch auf meinem Teller oder im Einkaufswagen. Während ich im Restaurant nicht direkt Einfluss darauf nehmen kann, ob mein Fisch aus einem nachhaltigen Fischfang kommt oder ob der Fischbestand gefährdet ist, kann ich mich Supermarkt bewusst für Meeresfrüchte und Fisch mit Nachhaltigskeitszertifikat entscheiden. © Daliah Hoffmann 
Vor einigen Monate habe ich unter einem Facebook-Post über meinen Besuch in der Sardinen.Bar in Schöneberg einige kritische Kommentare erhalten. "Wie könnt ihr heute überhaupt noch Fisch essen?!" war einer davon. Im Grunde ist es ganz einfach: Ich setze mich mit dem Thema auseinander und achte darauf, dass der Fisch aus nachhaltigem Fischfang kommt. Mein Einsatz gegen Überfischung beginnt auf meinem Teller. Der MSC behält Fische im Auge (so wo ich in der #EyesOnFish-Kampagne) und genau das können und sollten wir auch alle tun – angefangen beim nächsten Einkauf. 
Dieser Artikel entstand in Kooperation mit MSC.

thread.section_title: Chi non muore si rivede  – Il Fagiolino d´Oro
thread.title: Chi non muore si rivede
thread.title_full: Chi non muore si rivede

posts.author: Fagiolino98
posts.title: Chi non muore si rivede
posts.text:
Ehi cari blogger *~* È un po’ che non ci si sente. Lo so, ho trascurato questo bel blog, mi sono allontanato, forse ne avevo bisogno, infondo dobbiamo scrivere solo quando ce la sentiamo. È vero, mi mancano i vostri commenti, il vostro supporto, mi manca anche leggere i vostri blogger, quindi spero di riuscire ad essere più attivo in questi giorni.  Stranamente mi piace scrivere nel blog quando sono in sala d’aspetto dalla psicologa o al corso. Quando sono in casa no, non riesco a godermi il momento.   
Bene, sono tanti gli argomenti nuovi, ma non vi parlerò di tutto adesso, fra 7 minuti devo entrare nello studio della psicologa, ne ho bisogno, devo provare insieme alla psico a riordinare i miei pensieri , a mettere tutti i puntini sulle i.
Non ricordo se ve lo avevo detto, ma ho iniziato il corso di tedesco, sapete mi distrae, però è molto difficile, e io studio poco.   Con il cane le cose vanno un pochino meglio, riesco a stare più tranquillo nonostante tiri. Una mia amica mi dice che forse durante le passeggiate con il cane faccio uscire tutta la mia negatività, per questo esplodo di nervosismo. Adesso sto provando a contattarla controllarmi e va un po’ meglio. 
Bene ragazzi, io adesso devo andare, fra pochissimi minuti mi chiamerà la psicologa. Mi ha fatto tanto piacere scrivere questo articolo.  Un abbraccio *~*

thread.title_full: Murder charges filed in fatal Colorado Walmart shooting

posts.title: Murder charges filed in fatal Colorado Walmart shooting
posts.text:
Murder charges filed in fatal Colorado Walmart shooting Posted: Updated: DENVER - 
Prosecutors have filed murder and attempted murder charges against a man accused of walking into a suburban Denver Walmart and fatally shooting three people. Authorities on Monday made no mention of a possible motive for the attack during a hearing for 47-year-old Scott Ostrem. Investigators say Ostrem opened fire in the Walmart last Wednesday. Killed were 52-year-old Pamela Marques of Denver, 66-year-old Carlos Moreno of Thornton and 26-year-old Victor Vasquez of Denver. Ostrem did not enter a plea. He's being held without bail. The murder charges carry a sentence of life without parole or the death penalty. Prosecutors have not said whether they'll seek Ostrem's execution. The judge scheduled a Feb. 5 preliminary hearing for prosecutors to lay out their case. The judge will decide if the evidence is sufficient for a trial.

thread.title: Altında rekorlar yatırımcısını güldürdü
thread.title_full: Altında rekorlar yatırımcısını güldürdü

posts.title: Altında rekorlar yatırımcısını güldürdü
posts.text:
Altın borsada yatırımcısına kazandırıyor Altın yatırımcısına yüzde 21 kazandırdı Jeopolitik gelişmeler ve döviz kurlarındaki sert hareketlerin etkisiyle 158,9 liraya kadar yükselen gram altın, yatırımcısına geçen ay yüzde 5,6, yılın başından bu yana da yüzde 21 kazandırdı  27:50 Güncelleme: 12:28:39 AA 
Yurt içinde yatırımcıların en çok tercih ettiği yatırım araçlarından biri olan altın, yükseliş eğilimindeki döviz kurlarından ve son zamanlarda artan jeopolitik risklerden bulduğu destekle 3 Kasım'da tüm zamanların en yüksek seviyesi olan 158,9 lirayı gördü. 
2017'ye 130 lira seviyesinden başlayan, yıl içinde rekor üstüne rekor kıran gram altın, yatırımcısına geçen ay yüzde 5,6, yılın başından bu yana da yüzde 21 prim sağladı. 
Konuyla ilişkin AA muhabirine değerlendirmelerde bulunan AA Finans Analisti İslam Memiş, altının gram fiyatının yurt içi piyasalarda dolar/TL'den destek alarak bu ay tüm zamanların en yüksek seviyesi olan 158,9 lirayı test ettiğini söyledi. ALTIN FİYATLARINDA SON DURUM! ÇEYREK BUGÜN... 

Memiş, altının gram fiyatındaki yükselişlerin sürpriz olmadığını ifade ederek, Euro/dolar paritesindeki düşüşlerin dolar/TL'yi yukarı yönlü destekleyeceğini düşünüyorum. Özellikle altının gram fiyatındaki yükselişler orta vadede 165-170 lira seviyelerine kadar devam edebilir." dedi. 
Altının ons fiyatının, jeopolitik ve küresel piyasalardaki siyasi risk algısından olumlu yönde etkileneceğini, yatırımcıların risk algısının artmasıyla fiziki altın talebinde bulunabileceğini kaydeden Memiş, özellikle ABD, Kuzey Kore, İran, Suriye ve Suudi Arabistan tarafından gelecek haberlerin risk algısında etkili olacağını vurguladı. 
Memiş, "ABD 10 yıllık tahvil faizleri ve dolar endeksi her ne kadar iki aydır yükselişini sürdürse de, kalıcı olup olmayacağı belli değil. 
Eğer ABD Başkanı Donald Trump'ın soruşturmalarla önü kesilir, Trump siyasi risklerle karşı karşıya kalırsa finans piyasaları sert tepki verebilir. Bu nedenler, altının ons fiyatını ve yurt içi piyasalarda dolar/TL'nin yükselmesine neden olabilir. Altının gram fiyatı, bu kez hem altının ons fiyatından hem de dolar/TL'den destek alabilir." ifadelerini kullandı. 
"160 LİRA SEVİYESİ ÖNEMLİ" 
İntegral Yatırım Araştırma Uzman Yardımcısı Aylin Cevizci de eylül ayından bu yana TL'nin, dolar karşısında yüzde 9 değer kaybetmesi göz önüne alındığında, gram altının bu denli yükselişinde en önemli faktörün dolar/TL'den kaynaklandığını söylemenin mümkün olduğunu vurguladı. 
Cevizci, dolar/TL'nin 3,80-3,90 aralığındaki seyrini koruduğu sürece ons altına bakmak gerektiğini, altının ons fiyatının 1.290 seviyesine doğru yükselmesi halinde gram altının da yükselişini bir süre daha koruyacağını söyledi. 
Gram altının şu anda 158,2 lira direnci altında bulunduğunu ve bu seviyenin iyi bir realize noktası olabileceğini belirten Cevizci, "160 lira seviyesi önemli. 160 liranın aşılması halinde stratejilerde, alımdan daha çok satım yönlü hamleler uygun olabilir. Aşağıda ise 150-156 lira aralığı alım için uygun olabilir." diye konuştu. 
Ons altın için ABD Başkanı Trump'ın Asya ziyareti ile Güney Kore ve Japonya görüşmelerinden Kuzey Kore ile ilgili gelebilecek açıklamaların önem taşıdığını kaydeden Cevizci, "güvenli liman" talebini ön plana çıkarabilecek gelişmelerin altın için önemli olduğunu vurguladı. 
Gram altın yatırımcısı için fırsatların 150 lira seviyesini aşması ile başladığını ifade eden Cevizci, gram altında şu anki seviyelerde alım yapmanın kısa vadeli yatırımcı için risk, uzun vadeli yatırımcı için ise fırsat olabileceğini söyledi. borsa altın gram altın

thread.title: Apple says no operations were moved from Ireland - Good Articles to Share
thread.title_full: Apple says no operations were moved from Ireland - Good Articles to Share | I3investor

posts.author: Tan KW
posts.title: Apple says no operations were moved from Ireland - Good Articles to Share
posts.text:
NEW YORK: Apple Inc said on Monday that none of its operations were moved from Ireland and that changes made to its corporate structure in 2015 was specially designed to preserve tax payments to United States, not to reduce taxes anywhere else. The statement from Apple comes in response to the criticism it received for its tax affairs after a Guardian analysis of the "Paradise Papers" documents showed the company shifted key parts of its business to Jersey as part of a rearrangement that has allowed it to maintain a low tax rate.
Apple said it pays billions of dollars in taxes to the United States at the statutory 35 percent rate on investment income from its overseas cash. (http://apple.co/2AohvBE)
The "Paradise Papers" are a trove of financial documents leaked mostly from Appleby, a prominent offshore law firm. - Reuters

thread.title: (USA-CO-Denver) Accountant I
thread.title_full: (USA-CO-Denver) Accountant I

posts.title: (USA-CO-Denver) Accountant I
posts.text:
Colorado State Accountant I in Denver , Colorado 
Accountant I 
Colorado Department of Human Services 
Job Number 
This position is open only to Colorado state residents. 
About Us 
If your goal is to build a career that makes a difference, consider joining the dedicated people of the Colorado Department of Human Services (CDHS). Our professionals strive to design and deliver high quality human and health services that improve the safety, independence, and well-being of the people of Colorado. In addition to a great location and rewarding and meaningful work, we offer: 
Employee wellness programs 
Strong, secure, yet flexible retirement benefits including PERA Defined Benefit Plan or PERA Defined Contribution Plan plus 401K and 457 plans 
Medical and dental health plans 
Public Service Loan Forgiveness Program 
Paid life insurance 
Short and long-term disability coverage 
10 paid holidays per year plus vacation and sick leave 
Excellent work-life programs, such as flexible schedules, training opportunities, and more 
Our Culture & Environment 
Our vision is that the people of Colorado will be safe, healthy, and prepared to achieve their greatest aspirations. Through our core values listed below, CDHS staff are committed to: 
Making decisions with, and acting in the best interests of the people we serve, because Colorado's success depends on their well-being 
Sharing information, seeking input, and explaining our actions because we value accountability and transparency 
Managing our resources efficiently because we value stewardship 
Promoting a positive work environment, and supporting and developing employees, because their performance is essential to Colorado's success 
Meaningfully engaging our partners and the people we serve because we must work together to achieve the best outcomes 
Committing to continuous learning because Coloradoans deserve effective solutions today and forward-looking innovation for tomorrow 
Office of Long Term Care 
CO State Veterans Community Living Center at Fitzsimons 
Visit us online at: www.colorado.gov/cdhs/veteranshomes/fitzsimons 
Take a virtual tour of our facility: http://www.fitzveterans.com/ 
The Colorado State Veterans Nursing Home at Fitzsimons, located on 15 acres of the former Fitzsimons Army Medical Center, is a state-of-the-art nursing home serving veterans and their spouses. We are committed to caring for the whole person by addressing the personal and social needs of each resident, as well as their physical and medical requirements. All staff members of Fitzsimons are committed to providing a life of quality and dignity for every resident. We offer free employee parking and easy access to RTD routes. 
Description of Job 
What You'll be Doing 
This position takes care of the accounts receivable (billing/collections) for this 180-bed nursing home. This includes billing Private accounts, Medicaid, Hospice, Medicare parts A and B as well as any other third party insuresrs and supplemental insurance policies tied to the Medicare billings. In addition, VA per diem billing. This position will track the Medicaid status of residents, including working with Social Services, Admissions, County technicians, residents and/or families. Process resident refunds and assist residents and/or families with lump sum distributions from Department of Veteran Affairs. 
Job Duties: 
Bills Medicaid,Medicare, VA, Private Pay, Hospice and associated supplemental plans 
Creates and tracks monthly private billing statements 
Creates and tracks monthly insurance billing statements 
Coordinates with Medical Records to ensure census reflects correct payer sources 
Initiates first level collection efforts for outstanding private accounts 
Initiates new contracts with third party insurance carriers 
Tracks all non-Medicare contracts in PCC (AR billing system) ensuring timely payment 
Maintains accounts receivable control, current list of Medicaid eligible residents for staff and providers 
Report income and status changes to County Department of Social Services, and ensures alltitle XIX regulations are followed with regard to billing and eligibility. 
Tracks Medicare stays/RUG levels and works with interdisciplinary team for Medicare A&B services 
Minimum Qualifications, Substitutions, Conditions of Employment & Appeal Rights 
Minimum Qualifications 
Education: Graduation from an accredited college or university with a Bachelor's degree in Accounting. 
Note: A legible copy of a college or university transcript must be submitted in order for applicants to receive credit for the education requirement. 
Substitutions: 
Full-time professional accounting experience may substitute for the required bachelor's degree in accounting on a year-for-year basis. 
A bachelor's degree from an accredited college or university, which included 27 semester hours of accounting or auditing coursework may substitute for the required education. 
A Master's degree or doctorate degree in accounting or MBA with an emphasis in accounting or a doctorate degree in accounting from an accredited college or university may substitute for the bachelor's degree. 
A CPA license may substitute for the bachelor's degree. 
Definition of Professional Experience: While not fully encompassing, professional accounting experience is defined by the Colorado Department of Human Services as work that typically involves the following components: 
Analysis of financial transactions to determine accuracy, completeness, and conformance to established policies and procedures and generally accepted accounting standards; 
Preparing, analyzing, and interpreting financial reports, statements and records, (e.g. balance sheets, profit and loss statements, amortization and depreciation schedules); 
Assembling data and creating financial projections; 
Developing, implementing, modifying and documenting accounting systems; 
Reconciliation of accounts; 
Calculating and estimating effects of proposed changes in operating programs or accounting operations; 
Auditing processes; 
Revenue recognition & contract completion recognition; 
Account troubleshooting and problem solving; 
Implementing and/or designing of financial controls; 
GL system maintenance; and 
Making account recommendations. 
APPEAL RIGHTS: 
If you receive notice that you have been eliminated from consideration for the position, you may protest the action by filing an appeal with the State Personnel Board/State Personnel Director within 10 days from the date you receive notice of the elimination. 
Also, if you wish to challenge the selection and comparative analysis process, you may file an appeal with the State Personnel Board/State Personnel Director within 10 days from the receipt of notice or knowledge of the action you are challenging. 
Refer to Chapters 4 and 8 of the State Personnel Board Rules and Personnel Director's Administrative Procedures, 4 CCR 801, for more information about the appeals process. The State Personnel Board Rules and Personnel Director's Administrative Procedures are available at www.colorado.gov/spb. 
A standard appeal form is available at: www.colorado.gov/spb. If you appeal, your appeal must be submitted in writing on the official appeal form, signed by you or your representative, and received at the following address within 10 days of your receipt of notice or knowledge of the action: Colorado State Personnel Board/State Personnel Director, Attn: Appeals Processing, 1525 Sherman Street, 4th Floor, Denver, CO 80203. Fax: 303-866-5038. Phone: 303-866-3300. The ten-day deadline and these appeal procedures also apply to all charges of discrimination. 
Supplemental Information 
Preferred Qualifications 
Strong preference will be given to candidates who possess a bachelor's degree in accounting, or have 27 credit hours of accounting or auditing coursework from an accredited college or university 
Demonstrated proficiency with Microsoft Office software, specifically Excel and Access 
Reconciliation experience 
Demonstrated experience working with CORE (Advantage) 
Preference will be given to candidates with public-sector and/or government accounting experience 
Demonstrated knowledge and experience with Medicaid, Medicare, cost accounting, cost allocation and/or human-services related programs. 
Point Click Care (PCC) software experience and Medicare or Medicaid experience is preferred 
Nursing home experience 
Highly Desirable Knowledge, Skills & Abilities 
Demonstrated working knowledge of Generally Accepted Accounting Principles and Practices; 
Demonstrated working knowledge of Microsoft Office suite, specifically Word, and Excel 
Demonstrated working knowledge and experience working with complex accounting systems, such as CORE or similar product; 
Ability to locate and identify discrepancies utilizing spreadsheets and other written communications; 
Ability to work with confidential information, and maintain confidentiality; 
Ability to derive facts quickly, methodically, and accurately; 
Ability to develop constructive and cooperative working relationships with others, and maintain them over time; 
Ability to derive logical conclusions from available information, utilizing a combination of judgment and formal guidance, in order to determine if departmental objectives have been met; 
Ability to interact with various stakeholders, both internal and external to the unit, and able to demonstrate a strong customer orientation and dedication; and 
Ability to set and prioritize workload, identify short- and long-term goals and develop strategies to achieve them, and coordinate with internal and external business partners. 
Conditions of Employment 
The successful candidate in this position must be willing and available to submit to the following conditions: 
Must have a valid Colorado Drivers License 
Must be willing to submit to and able to successfully pass a criminal background check and pre-employment drug screening. 
Must be able to work with confidential information. 
Must be willing to receive an annual influenza vaccination or provide documentation for a medical or religious exemption at the time of hire. 
How to Apply (PLEASE READ CAREFULLY) 
Applicants are required to attach a cover letter and resume to their application. 
Please note that ONLY your State of Colorado job application will be reviewed during the initial screening; if you submit a resume and cover letter, they will be reviewed in later stages of the selection process. Therefore, it is paramount that you clearly describe all of your relevant experience on the application itself. Applications left blank or marked "SEE RESUME" will not be considered in the minimum qualifications review. 
Your application will be reviewed against the minimum qualifications for the position. If your application demonstrates that you meet the minimum qualifications, you will be invited to the comparative analysis process, which is described below. 
Note: Current and former employees (transfers, voluntary demotions and reinstatements) are required to apply and participate in the comparative analysis process. Former employees of the Colorado Department of Human Services (CDHS) who were disciplinary terminated or resigned in lieu of termination must disclose the information on your application and may not be eligible for employment at CDHS. 
Comparative Analysis Process 
The comparative analysis process for this position may consist of a structured application review, telephone interview and structured interview. Candidates who most closely meet the job requirements will move through successive stages of the process. Applicants will be notified of their status via email following each stage.

thread.title: Bath time
thread.title_full: Bath time - BabyCenter

posts.author: ilyfabrb
posts.text:
My daughter loves bath time, it really relaxes her. I try to give her a bath every night because she loves it so much but that doesn’t always happen. I shoot for at least every other day for her. She is 9 weeks old.
My son was a different story, he had such sensitive skin that a bath once or twice a week is all that he got because it would dry out his skin so badly if I bathed him too often.

thread.title: Avocado-Testdrücker und Paketabholer – 11 neue Berufe, die es dringend in Berlin geben sollte
thread.title_full: Avocado-Testdrücker und Paketabholer – 11 neue Berufe, die es dringend in Berlin geben sollte

posts.title: Avocado-Testdrücker und Paketabholer – 11 neue Berufe, die es dringend in Berlin geben sollte
posts.text:
Avocado-Testdrücker und Paketabholer – 11 neue Berufe, die es dringend in Berlin geben sollte © Kerstin Musl   
Natürlich haben wir ganz schöne first world problems . Aber problems sind auch Probleme und hier wie da verlangen sie nach Lösungen. Manche Hürden des Alltags sind allerdings so uralt, so komplex, so institutionell etabliert, dass es einfacher ist, jemanden einzustellen, der diese Probleme für uns löst oder wenigstens aushält. Außerdem wären auf diese Art ziemlich viele neue Arbeitsplätze geschaffen. Naja, keine besonders schöne Arbeit – aber wir hoffen auf die baldige Einsatzbereitschaft von künstlicher Intelligenz, die uns dann diese 11 Lästigkeiten abnehmen kann: 1. Der U-Bahn-Türaufhalter, wenn man spät dran ist © Kerstin Musl 2. Der Paket-von-der-Post-Abholer, wenn die Schlange in der Filiale wieder bis in den Tarifbereich C reicht 3. Der Foodora-Türöffner, wenn man nicht nur zu faul zum Kochen, sondern auch zum Aufstehen ist © Shutterstock 4. Der Mandarinenschäl-Assistent, der es erträgt, dass sein Daumen zwischen Oktober und Februar nach Mandarinenschale riecht 5. Der Avocado-Testdrücker, der 20 Minuten vor Ankunft im Supermarkt die Suche nach einer reifen Avocado beginnt © Nora Tabel 6. Der Bürgeramt-Stellvertreter, der für einen wartet, während die anderen 567 Nummern aufgerufen werden 7. Der Coop-Scout, der zu Fuß den nächsten Roller holt, wenn mal wieder im Radius von 2 Kilometern keiner verfügbar ist 8. Der Restaurant-Tester, der in jedem gehypten neuen Laden Schlange steht und Probe isst © Daliah Hoffmann 9. Der Instagram-Ghostposter, der den Followern ein sweetes Life vorgaukelt, während man mit Käse-Nachos im offenen Mund vor Netflix einschläft 10. Der befahrene Zurückpöbler, der im Straßenverkehr auf jede Beleidigung schlagfertig antwortet 11. Der Wetterfrosch, der jeden Morgen im gleichen Outfit schon mal rausgeht und sagen kann, ob man zu warm oder zu kalt angezogen ist © Hella Wittenberg

thread.title: Phát hành đặc biệt bộ tem “Chào mừng Năm APEC Việt Nam”
thread.title_full: Phát hành đặc biệt bộ tem “Chào mừng Năm APEC Việt Nam” | Thời Báo Tài Chính

posts.author: thoibaotaichinhvietnam.vn
posts.title: Phát hành đặc biệt bộ tem “Chào mừng Năm APEC Việt Nam”
posts.text:
(TBTCO) - Chào mừng sự kiện trọng đại Năm APEC Việt Nam 2017, Bộ Thông tin và Truyền thông, Tổng công ty Bưu điện Việt Nam phối hợp với Ủy ban Quốc gia APEC 2017 tổ chức phát hành đặc biệt bộ tem “Chào mừng Năm APEC Việt Nam 2017”. Bộ tem “Chào mừng Năm APEC Việt Nam 2017”do họa sỹ Tô Minh Trang, Tổng công ty Bưu điện Việt Nam thiết kế. Với sự sáng tạo và đổi mới, thông qua ngôn ngữ hội họa đặc trưng và sự phối mầu chặt chẽ, bộ tem “Chào mừng Năm APEC Việt Nam 2017” đã thể hiện chuẩn xác biểu trưng của Năm APEC Việt Nam 2017 là tập hợp những hình chuyển động xoay quanh tâm, được cách điệu từ hình tượng mái chèo và chim Lạc trên trống đồng Đông Sơn, cùng 21 tia mặt trời được vẽ cách điệu thành 7 con chim Lạc thể hiện cho 21 nền kinh tế thành viên APEC.
Biểu trưng Năm APEC Việt Nam 2017 nằm trên nền quả địa cầu với ý nghĩa đề cao vai trò và vị thế của Diễn đàn APEC đối với kinh tế thế giới, cũng như vai trò, tầm nhìn chiến lược của đối ngoại Việt Nam. Dưới mẫu tem là hình ảnh tiêu biểu các thành phố lớn của Việt Nam - nơi diễn ra các hội nghị quan trọng của Diễn đàn APEC: Hà Nội, Đà Nẵng và Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh.
Bộ tem “Chào mừng Năm APEC Việt Nam 2017”do họa sỹ Tô Minh Trang, Tổng công ty Bưu điện Việt Nam thiết kế. Tem gồm 1 mẫu, giá mặt 3000đ.
Với ngôn ngữ riêng hàm chứa nhiều ý nghĩa, nhiều thông tin, mẫu tem này sẽ là một thông điệp đa chiều đóng góp cho sự phát triển bền vững và thịnh vượng của Diễn đàn APEC cũng như thực hiện chủ đề của APEC 2017
Nhân dịp này, Tổng công ty Bưu điện Việt Nam đã chính thức triển khai dịch vụ mới - dịch vụ Tem bưu chính cá nhân (Stamp2Me). Đây là tem do Bộ Thông tin và Truyền thông phát hành có kèm khoảng trống để in thêm các hình ảnh, thông điệp cá nhân của người gửi. Tem bưu chính cá nhân có chức năng thanh toán cước phí bưu chính cho dịch vụ bưu gửi chuyển phát trong nước và quốc tế.
“Chào mừng năm APEC Việt Nam 2017” cũng chính là bộ tem đầu tiên được Tổng công ty Bưu điện Việt Nam triển khai thông qua dịch vụ Tem bưu chính cá nhân.
Theo Chinhphu.vn
